title: You Are Still Here - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Movie   Age Progression   Calm Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cold Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Mismatched Couple   Persistent Love Interests   Poor Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Quiet Characters   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Xin Yi Wu   辛夷塢
description: Our two leads of vastly different personalities have to battle through misunderstandings, the uncertainties of growing up as well as the greatest barrier that is the unspoken expectations they have of each other. Would their love remain resolute in trying circumstances or would it mellow with time? There is a saying the first cut is the deepest; will that be the case here?>
